documentType: administrative detention order and inmate records
summary: This document appears to be a list of administrative records and logs related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in July and August 2019, including his placement on administrative detention and suicide watch, as well as records for his cellmate Efrain Reyes. It includes various logs, staff memos, and a press release, compiled as part of an investigation or review following Epstein's death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Edward Epstein
persons.context: The primary subject of the administrative detention order and numerous prison logs (TRUSCOPE, suicide watch, psychology observation) from July 2019 until his death.

persons.name: Efrain Reyes
persons.context: Epstein's cellmate at MCC; court documentation and prison logs related to him are included in the record set.

persons.name: K. Schlessinger
persons.context: Mentioned as the author of a staff memo included in the documentation.

persons.name: N. Bullock
persons.context: Mentioned as the author of a staff memo included in the documentation.

persons.name: G. Adams
persons.context: Mentioned as the author of a staff memo included in the documentation.

connections.description: Reyes was Epstein's cellmate at the Metropolitan Correctional Center, as indicated by the documentation listing him as such.

events.title: Epstein Placed on Administrative Detention
events.description: An Administrative Detention (AD) Order was issued for Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Epstein on Suicide Watch
events.description: Suicide Watch Chronological logs were maintained for Epstein on these dates.

events.title: Extended Psychology Observation
events.description: Psychology Observation log books were maintained for Epstein from July 24 to July 30, 2019.

events.title: Court Documentation and Lt's Log
events.description: Court documentation regarding a WAB (possibly Writ of Audita Querela or similar) and a Lieutenant's log entry were created on this date, which was the day Epstein was found deceased.

events.title: SHU Weekly Review and Roster
events.description: A Special Housing Unit (SHU) weekly review and roster were completed.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York (inferred from context of federal inmate records and SHU)
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was under an Administrative Detention order and on suicide watch at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in late July 2019.
Detailed prison logs (TRUSCOPE, psychology observation, suicide watch) were maintained for Epstein from July 8 through at least July 30, 2019.
Epstein's cellmate was inmate Efrain Reyes (Reg. No. 85993-054), and records for both men are included.
The document set includes a press release and staff memos from officials including Acting Chief Psychologist K. Schlessinger, suggesting a post-incident review.
Court documentation regarding a 'WAB' (likely a legal filing) was dated August 9, 2019, the day Epstein was found dead in his cell.
